utils.左右滑動查看更多圖片: Swipe left and right to see more pictures

lockPage.點擊畫面來解鎖: Click on the screen to unlock.

aboutPage.國立高雄科技大學: National Kaohsiung University of Science and Technology

skillsPage.以下是我目前擁有的專長與技術：: The following are the expertise and skills I currently have:

projectDetail.結合三大功能集結而成的多功能網站，可以訂機票及購買商品並且可以查看動態: A multi-functional website that combines three major functions, you can book airline tickets and purchase goods and check the dynamics
projectDetail.社群媒體網站，可以在上面分享您的冰箱內容及查看他人冰箱內容: Social media sites where you can share the contents of your refrigerator and view the contents of other people's refrigerators
projectDetail.小型電商網站，可以上傳商品以及擁有購物車系統。使用 Express 實現REST: A small e-commerce website that can upload products and has a shopping cart system. Implement RESTful API with Express and use EJS as HTML boilerplate
projectDetail.傳統 Todo list，結合 Leaflet 開源地圖，以及 Open Wea: Traditional Todo list, combined with Leaflet open source map, and Open Weather to display the weather, packaged with Parcel
projectDetail.小型氣象查詢系統，可以查詢台灣各城市即時天氣資訊: Small weather query system, you can query real-time weather information of various cities in Taiwan
projectDetail.使用 React、Redux 開發機票訂購網站，擁有會員系統，可使用 Googl: Use React and Redux to develop an airline ticket ordering website with a membership system that can be logged in with Google and Facebook
projectDetail.使用 Sass 複製 Youtube 首頁，有 RWD 設計: Clone Youtube homepage with Sass, with RWD design
projectDetail.使用 React 搭配 Bootstrap 開發 Chrome 擴充元件，可在: Use React with Bootstrap to develop Chrome extension, you can use text notes on the Youtube timeline
